title: Russia restricts Instagram after its parent Meta allows violent threats against military for Ukraine invasion
content:
1. Russia restricts Instagram after its parent Meta allows violent threats against military for Ukraine invasion  CNBC
  2. Meta defends policy on allowing violent rhetoric towards Russia, insists it won't tolerate 'Russophobia'  Fox News
  3. Russia opens criminal investigation of Meta over death calls  Reuters
  4. War in Ukraine: Instagram banned in Russia over 'calls to violence'  BBC.com
  5. Russia widens social media crackdown by blocking Instagram  WANE
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Russia restricts Instagram after its parent Meta allows violent threats against military for Ukraine invasion  CNBC
Meta defends policy on allowing violent rhetoric towards Russia, insists it won't tolerate 'Russophobia'  Fox News
Russia opens criminal investigation of Meta over death calls  Reuters
War in Ukraine: Instagram banned in Russia over 'calls to violence'  BBC.com
Russia widens social media crackdown by blocking Instagram  WANE

localize.title: ロシア、親会社のメタがウクライナ侵攻で軍への暴力的な脅迫を許したため、インスタグラムを制限
俄罗斯限制Instagram，因为其母公司Meta允许对入侵乌克兰的军队进行暴力威胁
俄羅斯限制Instagram，因爲其母公司Meta允許對入侵烏克蘭的軍隊進行暴力威脅
